column3: trunk or leaves. What am I?@A bank@Cash flows through here...

column1: What can you break
column2: even if you never pick it up or touch it?@A promise@Using your pinky means it's serious

column1: A word I know
column4: and twelve remains. What am I?@Dozens@12...

column1: What word of five letters has only one left when two letters are removed?@Stone@___ age
What has golden hair and stands in the corner?@A broom@Used to sweep with
What type of dress can never be worn?@Address@It also applies to your house
No sooner spoken than broken. What is it?@Silence@Must be kept in a library
What has four fingers and thumb
column2: but it is not living?@A glove@Used for gardening

column1: I only lie down once â€“ when I die. What am I?@A tree@Lives for many years

What type of drum are you not able to play?@A conundrum@This question is a realllll...
What word becomes shorter when you add two letters to it?@Short@A tricky question...Look closer
You always find me in the past
column2: I can be created in the present
column3: but the future can never taint me. What am i?@History@You could even be remembered in it

column1: The person who makes it has no need of it
column2: the person who buys it has no use for it
column3: the person who uses it can neither see nor feel it. What is it?@A coffin@Rest in peace if you're stuck on

column1: Poor people have it. Rich People need it. If you eat it you die. What is it?@Nothing@The lack of something
What can go up a chimney down
column2: but can't go down a chimney up?@An umberalla@Might need it on a rainy day!

column1: I reflect light that's not very bright. I sit in the same place all year. You cannot see me right when it's not night? What am I?@The moon@Some says it's made of cheese
I can make people happy
column3: I can make people want me
column4: I can drive people crazy. What am I?@Love@Valentines is all about this!

column1: It is filled with keys but cannot open any door. What is it?@A piano@The keys are only 2 colours
I fly all day long but never go anywhere?What am I?@A flag@You see a lot of them at the Olympics
